fields.name: Positive Energy:
fields.value: Learn your target's defense power, plus or minus (100% - your score) / 100. For example, score 80% and target has 1.0x defense power, receive any value in the 0.80 to 1.20 range.

fields.name: Neutral Energy:
fields.value: Learn your target's score, plus or minus (110% - your score) divided by 10. For example, score 80% and target has 50.0% score, receive any value in the 53.0% to 47.0% range.

fields.name: Negative Energy (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 50% twice. Learn your target's attack power, plus or minus (120% - your score) / 100. For example, score 80% and target has 1.0x attack power, receive any value in the 0.60 to 1.40 range.
